channel.title: NONSTOP-PK (DRAGON CLAWS WORK 4HITS AND MUCH MORE!)More pictures added
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Nonstop-pk sponsor Realscape![/size]
Well this is Elite pkz Source and Bluurrs Client but i have made some changes inside it so honestly almost all credit to them and Very little to me i fixed a few errors worked with Anti-Dupe as well as some new commands and Skill areas. More then welcome to Download it. This is just for people who want a quick source and client to setup and release. Good luck and enjoy it.
